abstract: The banking giant was accused of fraud in selling low-value asset-backed securities.
snippet: The banking giant was accused of fraud in selling low-value asset-backed securities.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury in Manhattan has found Bank of America liable in a securities fraud trial that centered on the sales of asset-backed securities and involved some of the biggest names on Wall Street.

headline.main: Bank of America Liable in Securities Fraud
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Liable in Securities Fraud
